#labels api,model
This is an object level method.
It saves the current object to the database.
If the object's primary key matches one in the database the contents of that row will be updated, if not, a new row will be inserted.
Returns true if the object passes all validations and the object was saved to the database, otherwise it returns false.

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| This method takes no arguments || || || || ||
